original_text: The steward took the men into Joseph’s house, gave them water to wash their feet and provided fodder for their donkeys.
korean_text: 그들을 요셉의 집으로 인도하고 물을 주어 발을 씻게 하며 그들의 나귀에게 먹이를 주더라

sentences.original_text: The steward took the men into Joseph's house
sentences.korean_translation: 청지기가 그 사람들을 요셉의 집으로 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: gave them water to wash their feet
and provided fodder for their donkeys
